description: A room within the Punk Hazard research facility where Caesar Clown kept the giant children he was experimenting on. The room is filled with oversized furniture and toys suitable for the gigantified children.

keyEvents.title: Nami's Group Discovers the Biscuits Room
keyEvents.description: Nami, Sanji, Chopper, Franky, and Kin'emon's head escape from the prison cell and arrive in the Biscuits Room, where they encounter giant children.
keyEvents.significance: First encounter with the children who are victims of Caesar Clown's experiments.

keyEvents.title: Giant Children Debut
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats meet the giant children for the first time in the Biscuits Room.
keyEvents.significance: Introduction of the children who have been experimented on with gigantification drugs.

statusHistory.reason: Room is being used by Caesar to house his test subjects

name.japanese: パンクハザード研究所

description: The main research facility on Punk Hazard where Caesar Clown conducts his illegal experiments. The facility contains multiple rooms including the Biscuits Room, prison cells, and Caesar's personal laboratory.

keyEvents.title: Hazmat Soldiers Pursue Nami's Group
keyEvents.description: Soldiers wearing hazmat suits chase Nami's group and the children through the facility.
keyEvents.significance: Escalates the conflict within the laboratory.

keyEvents.title: Smoker Arrives at Punk Hazard Facility
keyEvents.description: Captain Smoker and his Marine battalion arrive at the main research facility.
keyEvents.significance: Brings the Marines into direct conflict with the illegal operations.

keyEvents.title: Trafalgar Law Appears at the Facility
keyEvents.description: Trafalgar Law emerges from the facility entrance to confront Smoker.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals Law's connection to the island.

statusHistory.reason: Facility is operational under Caesar Clown's control

description: A dangerous lake that separates the burning hot side and frozen cold side of Punk Hazard. The water is boiling hot due to the island's extreme temperatures.

keyEvents.title: Usopp's Midori Boshi: Boaty Banana
keyEvents.description: Usopp creates a banana-shaped boat to cross the boiling lake waters.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Group Crosses the Lake
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Zoro, Robin, and Usopp successfully cross the lake using the Boaty Banana.
keyEvents.significance: The group progresses toward the cold side of Punk Hazard.

statusHistory.reason: Natural lake formed by the island's extreme climate

description: The frozen half of Punk Hazard, perpetually covered in ice and snow. This side of the island is extremely cold due to Aokiji's ice powers used during his battle with Akainu.

keyEvents.title: Brook Builds Snowmen
keyEvents.description: Brook entertains himself by constructing elaborate snowmen on the frozen side.

keyEvents.title: Brook Encounters Kin'emon's Torso
keyEvents.description: Brook discovers and engages in combat with Kin'emon's sword-wielding torso.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the next episode's conflict.

statusHistory.reason: Permanently frozen due to Aokiji's ice powers

description: Caesar Clown's personal laboratory within the Punk Hazard facility where he conducts his most secretive and dangerous experiments.

keyEvents.title: Caesar Orders His Men to Hide
keyEvents.description: Caesar is informed of Smoker's arrival and commands his subordinates to hide while he transforms into gas and hides in a beaker.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals Caesar's awareness and his gas transformation ability.

statusHistory.reason: Caesar's operational base on Punk Hazard
